ygData.subject: Re: MeowMix
ygData.msgSnippet: Trinity:: She cried.  She looked up at Perplex. I m sorry. I won t run away. ... parents were ... in my ... memories with ... awful ones ... with me,

Trinity::

She cried.  She looked up at Perplex. "I'm sorry. I won't run away."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Perplex: It may not look like it, but I feel the same way. My 
parents were
> both killed in cold blood, it is a terrible thing. Zeni misses them
> terribly, you aren't alone. Gramps misses them, too, my mom was his
> daughter, and my dad was his daughter's husband. It isn't very fun 
in my
> memories neither, Trinity, but I'm trying to replace the bad 
memories with
> the good ones, I continue to do so every day of my life, and so does
> Gramps...and Zeni. Technosis has faced hardships, too. Maybe more 
awful ones
> than we'll ever know, and she's still trucking along. Come back 
with me,
> Trinity, don't run away. Zeni needs you...
